## Description {#details}

A function analysis which provides an <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache">AssumptionCache</a></code>.

This analysis is intended for use with the new pass manager and will vend assumption caches for a given function.

Definition at line 173 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/assumptioncache-h">AssumptionCache.h</a>.
